SEARCH

Class SoundManager

java.lang.Object
SoundManager
public class SoundManager extends Object
SoundManager handles all sound-related functionality in the game. This class manages background music, sound effects, and provides methods to control playback of different audio elements. It maintains the state of background music and ensures proper sound management throughout the game.
Author:
Group 78
